comments.body: I've been told that we shouldn't add anything to `pkg`, unless it's actually used in multiple places.
Also, have you considered to make this external from KCM?

I'm putting it there as it is a peer to the serviceaccount stuff.  In some ways these are very similar. if you have another place to put it, let me know.

As for making it external from KCM -- as this is part of cluster bootstrap I'm not sure what other process it would belong in. At the end of the day, we can't introduce a new daemon for every controller.  Well, we could, but it would be a bit crazy.  Binding a lot of controllers into the KCM is a necessary efficiency trade off.
Ok, just wanted to hear your reasoning, thanks üëç
